arts.ttl: Napoli Player Ratings vs Milan: Meret Keeps Partenopei in Scudetto Race
arts.sum: Napoli re-established a three-point deficit to Serie A leaders Inter with a crucial 2-1 home victory against out-of-sorts Milan. Antonio Conte's side decided the game already in the first half, but the visitors nearly pulled off a comeback after the break. The post Napoli Player Ratings vs Milan: Meret Keeps Partenopei in Scudetto Race appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
